translations: v．凝视，注视：长时间、专注地看着某物或某人。
· She gazes at the stars every night.

phrs.translation: ◎【纹章学】(鹿或类似鹿的动物)从旁看去似在盯着人看的，侧身正视的

sentences.sentence: A beautiful girl gazes from the jacket of this book.
sentences.translation: 一位漂亮的女孩从这本书的护封里凝视过来。

sentences.sentence: Sometimes she goes out into the garden and gazes up at the stars.
sentences.translation: 她有时走到花园里去凝视天上的星星。

sentences.sentence: O sweetheart of the gazes bright!
sentences.translation: 啊目光炯炯有神的爱人！
